biotools.summary: An interactive version of DREM software, which enables to integrate static protein-DNA interaction data with different types of time series data for reconstructing dynamic regulatory networks. It also allows users to interactively visualize a gene, TF, path or model-centric view of each of these data types, their interactions and their impact on the resulting model.

bioschemas.name: iDREM
